subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Death and Dying
Funerals
lead_paragraph: Thousands of people attended the funeral of the 2008 Olympic marathon champion Samuel Wanjiru after weeks of legal wrangling amid a continuing investigation into his death.
snippet: Thousands of people attended the funeral of the 2008 Olympic marathon champion Samuel Wanjiru after weeks of legal wrangling amid a continuing investigation into his death.
